com.prezi.spaghetti.structure.internal

Interface StructuredAppender

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StructuredWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStructuredAppender, StructuredDirectoryWriter, StructuredZipWriter

    public interface StructuredAppender
    An appender to create file structures.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendFile(java.lang.String path, java.lang.CharSequence contents)
      Appends a file from a CharSequence.
      void appendFile(java.lang.String path, java.io.File contents)
      Appends a file from another file.
      void appendFile(java.lang.String path, java.io.InputStream contents)
      Appends a file from an InputStream.
      void appendFile(java.lang.String path, IOAction<java.io.OutputStream> contents)
      Appends a file from an IOAction.
      StructuredAppender subAppender(java.lang.String path)
      Creates an appender for a sub-directory of this appender.

                IOAction<java.io.OutputStream> contents)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Appends a file from an IOAction.
        Parameters:

      • appendFile

        void appendFile(java.lang.String path,
                java.io.InputStream contents)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Appends a file from an InputStream. The stream is closed after its contents are appended to the structure.
        Parameters:
        path - location of the file in the structure.
        contents - contents of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
